clinical_study.brief_title: Drug-drug Interaction Study Between Edaravone and 2-Aminoethanesulfonic Acid in Compound Edaravone Injection
clinical_study.official_title: An Experiment to Evaluate the Drug-drug Interaction of Formula Edaravone and Formula 2-Aminoethanesulfonic Acid in Compound Edaravone Injection

brief_summary.textblock: An experiment to evaluate the drug-drug interaction of formula edaravone and formula 2-aminoethanesulfonic acid in compound edaravone injection.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax of edaravone with and without coIntravenous with 2-Aminoethanesulfonic Acid
AUC0-t of edaravone with and without coIntravenous with 2-Aminoethanesulfonic Acid
AUC0-∞ of edaravone with and without coIntravenous with 2-Aminoethanesulfonic Acid

arm_group.description: 30 mL (containing edaravone 30 mg and 2-aminoethanesulfonic acid 600 mg)

facility.name: Beijing Tiantan Hospital, Capital Medical University
